title: [Cancer] Cannabis suppresses antitumor immunity by inhibiting JAK/STAT signaling in T cells through CNR2: "These findings indicated that the ECS is involved in the suppression of the antitumor immune response, suggesting that cannabis and drugs containing THC should be avoided during cancer immunotherapy."
[Neuroscience] Protein lifetimes in aged brains reveal a proteostatic adaptation linking physiological aging to neurodegeneration (May 2022)
